title: Introducing New Zealand
creator_contributor_role: New Zealand National Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cities and towns
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/New Zealand - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/New Zealand - Social life and customs
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Agriculture - New Zealand
description: A survey of New Zealand showing the scenery, primary and secondary industries, cities and towns during the 1950s. Stresses that the economy of the country rested on exports of meat, wool and dairy produce. Shows some of the recreational activities of the people including football, bush walking, sailing and fishing.
